title: Black Friday: Get a MagSafe-compatible iPhone charger for just $35
description:
When the low battery alert strikes, you want to be able to get a charge in a hurry. With the Speedy Mag Wireless Charger for iPhone, you can quickly get back up to full power absolutely anywhere. Through November 27th only, you can get this wireless charger for 70% off at just $34.97.

This sleek wireless charger is compatible with iPhone 12 or newer and supports fast charging standards. With a built-in magnet and metal plate, it’s MagSafe-compatible to lock your phone safely in place while it’s charging so you don’t accidenta
